```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(XLConnect)
```

## Load data

```{r}
iondf <- read_csv("../3-GenstatOutput/QTLlistForAllTraits_flankmarker.csv", col_names = TRUE)
```

```{r}
iondf %>%
  group_by(TRAIT) %>%
  summarise(count = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(count))

iondf %>%
  arrange(CHR, POS)

iondf %>%
  arrange(LOD)
```
